featured.text: Hiking, camping, and scuba diving are excellent on the island.
: 27 Jack: Well, apart from that, we did everything we wanted to—hiking, fishing and swimming.
Swimming, hiking, boating, fishing--the days were not long enough to contain all of our activities.

definition.zh_def: 徒步旅行，通常在自然環境中進行的長途步行活動。
definition.en_def: The activity of going for long walks in the countryside or in nature.
definition.example: We went hiking in the mountains last weekend.
